title: Ticket #6140: Undocumented security knobs
description: Sec. 3.5.25 of the Condor 8.6.0 manual "Configuration File Entries Relating to Security" begins with the text "This section has not yet been written" for many security-related knobs.
remarks: I'm assuming solely based on the age of this ticket that it's safe to demote to priority 5. If I'm wrong, please speak up.
creator: tpdownes
